planning: a. If defeated, recover all damage.
action: Buy a ship card. If unable, buy a gear card.
encounter: a. If negative reputation matching a patrol in this space, encounter that patrol.
b. If Enfys Nest has an empty crew slot, reveal the facedown contact token of the lowest class on this planet and gain the crew on its card for free.
c. Gain 4 000 credits and additional 1 000 credits for each Enfys Nest's crew. Then, lose 1 reputation with this planet's faction (if any).
special: Discard top cards from bounty and luxury market decks. Then shuffle this AI deck.
